Articles.Content:
So I installed kerbal Konstructs in my KSP 1.8, placed 2 launch pads and set up them correctly. Then, I go to the vab and build a rocket. I select the launchpad and the game says that it was correctly set up as launchpad. But, when I click in "launch", it appears in the default KSP launchpad.

Anyone can help?

Thank you.
1st thing would be to update ksp to the current version, otherwise you will have to do some mod archeology to figure out what version of the mod was compatible with your game.
